item.title: 美国消费者信心在一月初有所回升
item.description: 一项调查显示，1月初美国消费者信心有所回升，但家庭仍持续担忧通胀和劳动力市场疲软。【原文：U.S. consumer sentiment perked up in early January, but households continued to worry about inflation and a weakening labor market, a survey showed on Friday.】

item.title: 向美国政府提起关税退税诉讼的跨国公司
item.description: Thousands of companies around the world have filed lawsuits challenging U.S. President Donald Trump's sweeping tariffs and sought refunds on duties paid.

item.title: US equity funds see weekly outflows on geopolitical, rate worries
item.description: 截至1月7日的七天内，美国股票基金遭遇大规模资金流出，投资者因全球紧张局势加剧而转为谨慎，同时美国就业报告即将发布——该报告被视为影响美联储利率前景的关键因素之一。【原文：U.S. equity funds saw sizeable outflows in the seven days through January 7, as investors turned cautious over deepening global tensions and ahead of the U.S. jobs report, seen as one of the factors influencing the Federal Reserve’s rate outlook.】

item.title: Saks Global seeks to file for bankruptcy as soon as Sunday, Bloomberg News reports
item.description: 彭博新闻周五援引知情人士消息报道，奢侈品零售商萨克斯全球公司计划最早于本周日申请第11章破产保护。【原文：Luxury retailer Saks Global is planning to file for Chapter 11 bankruptcy as soon as Sunday, Bloomberg News reported on Friday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Fed seen on longer rate-cut pause after jobs data
item.description: 美国失业率的下降可能缓解美联储对劳动力市场疲软的担忧，并为更长时间维持政策利率提供依据。交易员押注美联储将等到6月才重启降息。【原文：A drop in the U.S. unemployment rate may ease concerns at the Federal Reserve about labor market weakness and build the case for a longer hold on the policy rate, with traders betting the central bank will wait until June to resume reductions.】

item.title: Amazon Pharmacy starts offering Novo Nordisk's Wegovy weight-loss pill
item.description: Amazon Pharmacy said on Friday it now offers Novo Nordisk's Wegovy weight-loss pill through insurance plans as well as through a cash-pay option.

item.title: Instant view: US job growth slows in December, backs Fed rate pause this month
item.description: 12月美国就业增长放缓幅度超出预期，企业因进口关税和人工智能投资增加而谨慎招聘，但失业率降至4.4%，这支持了市场预期美联储本月将维持利率不变。【原文：U.S. job growth slowed more than expected in December amid business caution about hiring because of import tariffs and rising artificial intelligence investment, but the unemployment rate dipped to 4.4%, supporting expectations the Federal Reserve would leave interest rates unchanged this month.】

item.title: 贝恩资本支持的鲍勃折扣家具公司申请在美国上市
item.description: Furniture store chain Bob's Discount Furniture, backed by private equity firm Bain Capital, filed for an initial public offering in the United States on Friday.

item.title: 全球股票基金结束连续三周资金流入
item.description: 截至1月7日当周，全球股票基金录得三周来首次资金净流出，投资者因地缘政治担忧、美国利率不确定性及估值过高（尤其美国股市）而削减风险敞口。【原文：Global equity funds recorded their first weekly outflow in three weeks in the week through January 7 as investors trimmed risk on geopolitical concerns, U.S. rate uncertainty and stretched valuations, especially in U.S. stocks.】

item.title: 美国10月独栋住宅开工量回升，建筑许可量下滑
item.description: U.S. single-family homebuilding rebounded in October, but permits for future construction eased, signaling caution among builders as new housing inventory remains high and demand soft.

item.title: DeepSeek to launch new AI model focused on coding in February, The Information reports
item.description: 据《The Information》周五报道，知情人士透露，中国人工智能初创企业DeepSeek预计将于2月推出新一代人工智能模型V4，该模型具备强大的编程能力。【原文：Chinese AI startup DeepSeek is expected to launch its next-generation AI model V4 that features strong coding capabilities in February, The Information reported on Friday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 德国计划采取措施打击有害的人工智能图像篡改行为
item.description: Germany's justice ministry plans to present measures in the near future that would allow authorities to more effectively combat the use of artificial intelligence to manipulate images in ways that violate personal rights, a spokesperson said on Friday.

item.title: 美国12月就业增长放缓
item.description: 美国就业增长放缓幅度超出预期，企业因进口关税而谨慎招聘，同时人工智能投资持续增长，但失业率已降至4.4%。【原文：U.S. job growth slowed more than expected amid business caution about hiring because of import tariffs and rising artificial intelligence investment, but the unemployment rate dipped to 4.4%.】

item.title: US mortgage lenders rally on Trump administration's plan to buy $200 billion in bonds
item.description: 抵押贷款机构股价周五盘前交易中大幅上涨，此前一天美国总统唐纳德·特朗普表示，他已下令其代表购买2000亿美元抵押贷款债券以降低住房成本。【原文：Mortgage lenders surged in premarket trading on Friday, a day after U.S. President Donald Trump said he is ordering his representatives to buy $200 billion in mortgage bonds to bring down housing costs.】

item.title: Andreessen Horowitz raises $15 billion across five funds for tech startup investments
item.description: 风险投资巨头安德森·霍洛维茨公司周五宣布，其五只新基金已募集资金逾150亿美元。随着人工智能技术的快速普及，投资者对科技初创企业的投资热情持续高涨。【原文：Andreessen Horowitz has raised more than $15 billion across five new funds, the venture capital giant said on Friday, as investor appetite for tech startups surges with the rapid adoption of artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 中国极氪品牌将进军更多欧洲市场，考虑推出混合动力车型，高管表示
item.description: 高端中国电动汽车制造商极氪将于2026年进军更多欧洲市场，包括法国、英国、意大利和西班牙，并正考虑在该地区推出增程插电式混合动力车型，公司高管周五表示。【原文：Premium Chinese electric vehicle maker Zeekr will expand into more European markets in 2026, including France, the United Kingdom, Italy and Spain and is considering launching extended-range plug-in hybrids in the region, an executive said on Friday.】

item.title: Elon Musk's Grok faces global scrutiny for sexualised AI photos
item.description: 从欧洲到亚洲的各国政府和监管机构纷纷谴责埃隆·马斯克旗下xAI聊天机器人Grok在X平台上生成的露骨色情内容，部分机构已就此展开调查，迫使该平台展示其预防和清除非法内容的具体措施。【原文：Governments and regulators from Europe to Asia have condemned and some have opened inquiries into sexually explicit content generated by Elon Musk's xAI chatbot Grok on X, putting pressure on the platform to show what it is doing to prevent and remove illegal content.】

item.title: 稳定币公司Rain在最新融资轮估值达19.5亿美元
item.description: 稳定币公司Rain周五宣布，在由ICONIQ领投的融资轮中筹集了2.5亿美元，公司估值达19.5亿美元。随着投资者对加密货币领域的兴趣持续增长，此轮融资顺利完成。【原文：Stablecoin firm Rain said on Friday it has raised $250 million in a funding round led by ICONIQ, valuing the company at $1.95 billion, as investor interest in the crypto sector continues to grow.】

item.title: 中国晶门科技在香港上市定价6亿美元，锁定高端定价区间
item.description: 据周五交易所公告显示，中国晶门科技在香港上市时将每股H股定价为162港元，募集资金46.8亿港元（6.004亿美元）。【原文：China's GigaDevice Semiconductor , has set an offer price of HK$162 per H share in its Hong Kong listing, raising HK$4.68 billion ($600.40 million), according to an exchange filing on Friday.】

item.title: 施罗丁格将提供礼来的人工智能药物发现平台在其软件上
item.description: 施罗丁格公司周五宣布，正与礼来公司合作，在其药物设计软件中提供这家制药巨头基于人工智能的平台TuneLab。【原文：Schrodinger said on Friday it is collaborating with Eli Lilly to offer the pharmaceutical major's AI-based platform, TuneLab, on its drug designing software.】

item.title: 极星季度电动车销量激增，欧洲战略转型成效显著
item.description: 电动汽车制造商极星汽车周五报告称，受近期聚焦欧洲市场的战略推动，其第四季度汽车销量大幅增长。【原文：EV maker Polestar reported a sharp rise in fourth‑quarter vehicle sales on Friday, helped by its recent strategy of focusing on Europe.】

item.title: 马斯克旗下AI机器人Grok因遭遇强烈反对，现将X平台的图像生成功能限制为付费用户专享。
item.description: 埃隆·马斯克创立的初创公司xAI已将旗下Grok聊天机器人的图像生成功能限制为社交媒体平台X的付费用户专享。此前该工具利用人工智能生成性化图像引发了广泛的负面反应。【原文：Elon Musk's startup xAI has restricted the image generation function on its Grok chatbot on social media platform X to paid subscribers, after the tool's use of AI to create sexualized images sparked a widespread backlash.】

item.title: 晨间竞标：新世界秩序万岁
item.description: 迈克·多兰和ROI团队本周末最期待阅读、观看和收听的内容。【原文：Everything Mike Dolan and the ROI team are excited to read, watch and listen to over the weekend.】

item.title: 欧盟发言人表示，欧盟正考虑要求WhatsApp在处理有害内容方面承担更多责任。
item.description: 欧盟委员会发言人周五表示，该机构正考虑重新划分Meta旗下WhatsApp即时通讯服务的分类，以使其在处理非法和有害内容方面承担更多责任。【原文：The European Commission is considering recategorizing Meta's WhatsApp messaging service to make it more responsible for tackling illegal and harmful content, a spokesperson for the commission said on Friday.】

item.title: 珠宝制造商潘多拉表示，北美地区消费者信心疲软拖累了公司增长。
item.description: 丹麦珠宝集团潘多拉周五警告称，由于去年最后两个月北美地区消费者信心疲软，2025年销售额增长将低于预期，导致其股价下跌。【原文：Danish jewellery group Pandora warned on Friday of lower-than-expected 2025 sales growth due to weak consumer sentiment in North America in the last two months of the year, sending its shares down.】

item.title: 美国股指期货在关键就业报告和关税裁决前表现低迷
item.description: 美国股市期货周五表现平淡，因投资者在关键的非农就业报告和最高法院对特朗普关税案裁决公布前，不愿进行大规模押注。【原文：U.S. stock index futures were muted on Friday, as investors refrained from placing big bets ahead of a crucial nonfarm payrolls report and a Supreme Court ruling on President Donald Trump's tariffs.】

item.title: 国防企业就特朗普政府限制赔偿金支付寻求法律建议
item.description: 三名消息人士称，在特朗普总统签署行政命令，将股票回购、股息和高管薪酬与武器交付进度挂钩后，美国国防承包商正寻求法律咨询。【原文：Defense contractors are seeking legal advice after U.S. President Donald Trump signed an executive order to tie share buybacks, dividends and executive pay to weapons delivery schedules, three sources said.】

item.title: 特朗普关税如何在南加州商业园区引发连锁反应
item.description: 绿意盎然的莱伊峡谷商务园区堪称全球化美国经济的缩影，而关税问题正成为热门话题。【原文：The lushly landscaped business park of Rye Canyon is the epitome of a globalized American economy and tariffs are a hot topic.】

item.title: 丹麦潘多拉公司第四季度初步销售额下滑，消费者信心疲软
item.description: 概述【原文：Overview】

item.title: 物理AI称霸CES展会，但人类仍需等待一段时间才能拥有类人仆役
item.description: 就在ChatGPT问世四年后——这款聊天机器人将人工智能带入主流视野——本周拉斯维加斯消费电子展上，几乎所有参展商都在大力宣传其人工智能驱动的设备。【原文：Just four years after the launch of ChatGPT, the chatbot that brought artificial intelligence into the mainstream, and it seemed like almost every exhibitor at the CES show in Las Vegas this week was touting an AI-powered gadget.】
